description: The identifier for a `Shipping Instructions` provided by the carrier for system purposes.
description_ZH: 承運商出於系統目的而提供的“運輸指令”標識符。

description:
Specifies the type of the transport document
- `BOL` (Bill of Lading)
- `SWB` (Sea Waybill)
description_ZH:
指定運輸單據的類型
- `BOL`（提單）
- `SWB`（海運單）

description: Specifies whether the Transport Document is a received for shipment, or shipped on board.
description_ZH: 指定運輸單據是接收裝運還是裝船裝運。

description:
An indicator of whether freight and ancillary fees for the main transport are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`). When prepaid the charges are the responsibility of the shipper or the Invoice payer on behalf of the shipper (if provided). When collect, the charges are the responsibility of the consignee or the Invoice payer on behalf of the consignee (if provided).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
主要運輸的運費和輔助費用是預付（“PRE”）還是到付（“COL”）的指標。預付時，費用由托運人或代表托運人的發票付款人（如果提供）負責。到付時，費用由收貨人或代表收貨人的發票付款人（如果提供）負責。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether the costs for inland transportation to the port, when applicable, are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示到港口的內陸運輸費用（如果適用）是預付（“PRE”）還是到付（“COL”）的。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether the origin port charges are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示始發港費用是預付費 (`PRE`) 還是到付 (`COL`)。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether origin charges (excluding port and haulage) are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示始發地費用（不包括港口和運輸）是預付（`PRE`）還是到付（`COL`）的。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether the costs for inland transportation to the port, when applicable, are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示到港口的內陸運輸費用（如果適用）是預付（“PRE”）還是到付（“COL”）的。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether the destination port charges are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示目的地端口費用是預付 (`PRE`) 還是到付 (`COL`)。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description:
An indicator of whether destination charges (excluding port and haulage) are prepaid (`PRE`) or collect (`COL`).

- `PRE` (Prepaid)
- `COL` (Collect)
description_ZH:
指示目的地費用（不包括港口和運輸）是預付（“PRE”）還是到付（“COL”）的指標。

- `PRE`（預付費）
- `COL`（收集）

description: An indicator whether the transport document is electronically transferred.
description_ZH: 運輸單據是否以電子方式傳輸的指示符。

description:
Indicates whether the B/L is issued `to order` or not. If `true`, the B/L is considered negotiable and an Endorsee party can be defined in the Document parties. If no Endorsee is defined, the B/L is blank endorsed. If `false`, the B/L is considered non-negotiable (also referred to as `straight`).

`isToOrder` must be `false` if `transportDocumentTypeCode='SWB'` (Sea Waybill).
description_ZH:
表明提單是否“按訂單”簽發。如果“true”，則提單被視為可轉讓，並且可以在單據當事人中定義被背書方。如果未定義背書人，則提單為空白背書。如果“假”，則提單被視為不可轉讓（也稱為“直接”）。

如果“transportDocumentTypeCode='SWB'”（海運單），“isToOrder”必須為“false”。

description:
The requested number of copies of the `Transport Document` to be issued by the carrier including charges.

**Conditions:** The following table defines the conditions for the `numberOfCopiesWithCharges` property:
| Transport Document Type Code | Is Electronic | Meaning |
|-------|:-------:|-------|
|`BOL`|`false`|How many paper copies of the Original BL to be issued by the carrier with charges|
|`BOL`|`true`|Not applicable, there are no copies|
|`SWB`|`false`|Indicates that charges should be included in the `SWB` (pdf or other formats)|
|`SWB`|`true`|Indicates that charges should be included in the electronic `SWB`|
description_ZH:
要求承運人簽發的“運輸文件”副本數量（含費用）。

**條件：** 下表定義了 `numberOfCopiesWithCharges` 屬性的條件：
|運輸單據類型代碼 |是電子的|意義|
|--------|:--------:|--------|
|`BOL`|`假`|承運人需出具多少份帶費用的正本提單紙質副本|
|`BOL`|`true`|不適用，沒有副本|
|`SWB`|`false`|表示費用應包含在`SWB`（pdf 或其他格式）中|
|`SWB`|`true`|表示費用應包含在電子`SWB`|中

description:
The requested number of copies of the `Transport Document` to be issued by the carrier **NOT** including charges.

**Conditions:** The following table defines the conditions for the `numberOfCopiesWithoutCharges` property:
| Transport Document Type Code | Is Electronic | Meaning |
|-------|:-------:|-------|
|`BOL`|`false`|How many paper copies of the Original BL to be issued by the carrier without charges|
|`BOL`|`true`|Not applicable, there are no copies|
|`SWB`|`false`|Indicates that charges should NOT be included in the `SWB` (pdf or other formats)|
|`SWB`|`true`|Indicates that charges NOT should be included in the electronic `SWB`|
description_ZH:
要求承運人簽發的“運輸文件”副本數量**不**包括費用。

**條件：** 下表定義了 `numberOfCopiesWithoutCharges` 屬性的條件：
|運輸單據類型代碼 |是電子的|意義|
|--------|:--------:|--------|
|`BOL`|`假`|承運人免費開具多少份紙質提單正本|
|`BOL`|`true`|不適用，沒有副本|
|`SWB`|`false`|表示費用不應包含在`SWB`（pdf 或其他格式）中|
|`SWB`|`true`|表示電子`SWB`中不應包含費用|

description:
Number of originals of the Bill of Lading that has been requested by the customer with charges.
        
**Condition:** Only applicable if `transportDocumentType` = `BOL` (Bill of Lading). If `isElectronic = 'True'`, accepted value is `1` (one) or `0` (zero)
description_ZH:
客戶要求收費的提單正本份數。
        
**條件：** 僅當 `transportDocumentType` = `BOL`（提單）時適用。如果“isElectronic = 'True'”，則接受的值為“1”（一）或“0”（零）

description:
Number of originals of the Bill of Lading that has been requested by the customer without charges.
        
**Condition:** Only applicable if `transportDocumentType` = `BOL` (Bill of Lading). If `isElectronic = 'True'`, accepted value is `1` (one) or `0` (zero)
description_ZH:
客戶免費索取的提單正本份數。
        
**條件：** 僅當 `transportDocumentType` = `BOL`（提單）時適用。如果“isElectronic = 'True'”，則接受的值為“1”（一）或“0”（零）

description:
The name to be used in order to specify how the `Place of Receipt` should be displayed on the `Transport Document` to match the name and/or address provided on the `Letter of Credit`.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
用於指定“運輸單據”上應如何顯示“收貨地點”以匹配“信用證”上提供的名稱和/或地址的名稱。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description:
The name to be used in order to specify how the `Port of Load` should be displayed on the `Transport Document` to match the name and/or address provided on the `Letter of Credit`.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
用於指定“裝運港”應如何在“運輸單據”上顯示以與“信用證”上提供的名稱和/或地址相匹配的名稱。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description:
The name to be used in order to specify how the `Port of Discharge` should be displayed on the `Transport Document` to match the name and/or address provided on the `Letter of Credit`.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
用於指定“卸貨港”在“運輸單據”上的顯示方式，以與“信用證”上提供的名稱和/或地址相匹配的名稱。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description:
The name to be used in order to specify how the `Place of Delivery` should be displayed on the `Transport Document` to match the name and/or address provided on the `Letter of Credit`.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
用於指定如何在“運輸單據”上顯示“交貨地點”，以匹配“信用證”上提供的名稱和/或地址。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description: The name of the location.
description_ZH: 位置的名稱。

description:
The UN Location code specifying where the place is located. The pattern used must be

- 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
- 3 characters to code a location within that country. Letters A-Z and numbers from 2-9 can be used

More info can be found here: [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)
description_ZH:
指定地點所在位置的聯合國位置代碼。使用的模式必須是

- 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的 2 個字符表示國家/地區代碼
- 3 個字符來編碼該國家/地區內的位置。可以使用字母 A-Z 和數字 2-9

更多信息可以在這裡找到：[UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)

description: The contact details of the person(s) to contact in relation to the **Transport Document** (changes, notifications etc.)
description_ZH: 與**運輸文件**相關的聯繫人詳細信息（變更、通知等）

description: Name of the contact
description_ZH: 聯繫人姓名

description: Indicates whether the Carrier's agent at destination name, address and contact details should be included in the `Transport Document`.
description_ZH: 指示“運輸文件”中是否應包含目的地承運人代理人的名稱、地址和聯繫方式。

description: Name of the party.
description_ZH: 政黨名稱。

description:
Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS` (Not a legal person, but recognised under Union or National law as having the capacity to perform legal acts)
description_ZH:
根據聯盟海關法典，可以是以下值之一。 5（4）：
- `NATURAL_PERSON`（作為個體的活人的人）
- `LEGAL_PERSON`（可以執行法律行動的人（包括人類和公共或私人組織），例如擁有財產、起訴和被起訴）
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS`（不是法人，但根據聯邦或國家法律承認具有執行法律行為的能力）

description: The name of the street of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的街道名稱。

description: The number of the street of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的街道號碼。

description: The floor of the party’s street number.
description_ZH: 當事人所在街道的樓層。

description: The post code of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的郵政編碼。

description: A numbered box at a post office where a person or business can have mail or parcels delivered.
description_ZH: 郵局的編號信箱，個人或企業可以在其中投遞郵件或包裹。

description: The city name of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的城市名稱。

description:
The UN Location code specifying where the carrier booking office is located. The pattern used must be
- 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
- 3 characters to code a location within that country. Letters A-Z and numbers from 2-9 can be used
More info can be found here: [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)
description_ZH:
指定承運人預訂辦公室所在位置的聯合國位置代碼。使用的模式必須是
- 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的 2 個字符表示國家/地區代碼
- 3 個字符來編碼該國家/地區內的位置。可以使用字母 A-Z 和數字 2-9
更多信息可以在這裡找到：[UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)

description: The state/region of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址所在的州/地區。

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description:
The address of the party to be displayed on the `Transport Document`. The displayed address may be used to match the address provided in the `Letter of Credit`.

**Conditions:** If provided:
  - the displayed address must be included in the `Transport Document`.
  - for physical BL (`isElectronic=false`), it is only allowed to provide max 2 lines of 35 characters
  - for electronic BL (`isElectronic=true`), the limit is 6 lines of 35 characters
  - the order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
“運輸文件”上顯示的當事人地址。顯示的地址可用於匹配“信用證”中提供的地址。

**條件：** 如果提供：
  - 顯示的地址必須包含在“運輸文件”中。
  - 對於物理 BL (`isElectronic=false`)，僅允許提供最多 2 行 35 個字符
  - 對於電子 BL (`isElectronic=true`)，限制為 6 行，每行 35 個字符
  - 該數組中項目的順序**必須**由 API 提供者保留。

description: **Condition:** Either the `address` or a party `identifyingCode` must be provided.
description_ZH: **條件：** 必須提供“地址”或一方“識別碼”。

description:
A list of codes identifying a party. Possible values are:
- `WAVE` (Wave)
- `CARX` (CargoX)
- `ESSD` (EssDOCS)
- `IDT` (ICE Digital Trade)
- `BOLE` (Bolero)
- `EDOX` (EdoxOnline)
- `IQAX` (IQAX)
- `SECR` (Secro)
- `TRGO` (TradeGO)
- `ETEU` (eTEU)
- `TRAC` (Enigio trace:original)
- `BRIT` (BRITC eBL)
- `GSBN` (Global Shipping Business Network)
- `WISE` (WiseTech)
- `GLEIF` (Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation)
- `W3C` (World Wide Web Consortium)
- `DNB` (Dun and Bradstreet)
- `FMC` (Federal Maritime Commission)
- `DCSA` (Digital Container Shipping Association)
- `ZZZ` (Mutually defined)
description_ZH:
識別一方的代碼列表。可能的值為：
- “波浪”（波浪）
- `CARX` (CargoX)
- `ESSD` (EssDOCS)
- “IDT”（ICE 數字貿易）
-“波萊”（波萊羅）
- “EDOX”（Edox在線）
- `IQAX` (IQAX)
- `SECR`（安全）
- `TRGO` (TradeGO)
- `ETEU` (eTEU)
- `TRAC`（Enigio 跟踪：原始）
- “英國”（BRITC eBL）
- `GSBN`（全球航運業務網絡）
- “WISE”（慧諮科技）
- `GLEIF`（全球法人機構識別編碼基金會）
-“W3C”（萬維網聯盟）
- “DNB”（鄧白氏）
- `FMC`（聯邦海事委員會）
- `DCSA`（數字集裝箱運輸協會）
- `ZZZ`（相互定義）

description: Code to identify the party as provided by the code list provider
description_ZH: 代碼列表提供商提供的用於識別當事人的代碼

description:
The name of the code list, code generation mechanism or code authority for the `partyCode`. Example values could be:
- `DID` (Decentralized Identifier) for `codeListProvider` `W3C`
- `LEI` (Legal Entity Identifier) for `codeListProvider` `GLEIF`
- `DUNS` (Data Universal Numbering System) for `codeListProvider` `DNB`
description_ZH:
`partyCode` 的代碼列表、代碼生成機製或代碼權威的名稱。示例值可以是：
- “codeListProvider”“W3C”的“DID”（去中心化標識符）
- “codeListProvider”“GLEIF”的“LEI”（法律實體標識符）
- “codeListProvider”“DNB”的“DUNS”（數據通用編號系統）

description: A list of `Tax References` for a `Party`
description_ZH: “一方”的“稅務參考”列表

description: The reference type code as defined by the relevant tax and/or legal authority.
description_ZH: 由相關稅務和/或法律機構定義的參考類型代碼。

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description: The value of the `taxLegalReference`
description_ZH: `taxLegalReference` 的值

description: A list of contact details
description_ZH: 聯繫方式列表

description: Name of the contact
description_ZH: 聯繫人姓名

description: A reference linked to the `Shipper`.
description_ZH: 鏈接到“托運人”的參考。

description: A list of `Purchase Order Reference`s linked to the `Shipper`.
description_ZH: 鏈接到“發貨人”的“採購訂單參考”列表。

description: Name of the party.
description_ZH: 政黨名稱。

Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)

description:
The UN Location code specifying where the carrier booking office is located. The pattern used must be
- 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
- 3 characters to code a location within that country. Letters A-Z and numbers from 2-9 can be used
More info can be found here: [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)
description_ZH:
指定承運人預訂辦公室所在位置的聯合國位置代碼。使用的模式必須是
- 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的 2 個字符表示國家/地區代碼
- 3 個字符來編碼該國家/地區內的位置。可以使用字母 A-Z 和數字 2-9
更多信息可以在這裡找到：[UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)

description:
The address of the party to be displayed on the `Transport Document`. The displayed address may be used to match the address provided in the `Letter of Credit`.

**Conditions:** If provided:
  - the displayed address must be included in the `Transport Document`.
  - for physical BL (`isElectronic=false`), it is only allowed to provide max 2 lines of 35 characters
  - for electronic BL (`isElectronic=true`), the limit is 6 lines of 35 characters
  - the order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
“運輸文件”上顯示的當事人地址。顯示的地址可用於匹配“信用證”中提供的地址。

**條件：** 如果提供：
  - 顯示的地址必須包含在“運輸文件”中。
  - 對於物理 BL (`isElectronic=false`)，僅允許提供最多 2 行 35 個字符
  - 對於電子 BL (`isElectronic=true`)，限制為 6 行，每行 35 個字符
  - 該數組中項目的順序**必須**由 API 提供者保留。

description:
Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS` (Not a legal person, but recognised under Union or National law as having the capacity to perform legal acts)
description_ZH:
根據聯盟海關法典，可以是以下值之一。 5（4）：
- `NATURAL_PERSON`（作為個體的活人的人）
- `LEGAL_PERSON`（可以執行法律行動的人（包括人類和公共或私人組織），例如擁有財產、起訴和被起訴）
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS`（不是法人，但根據聯邦或國家法律承認具有執行法律行為的能力）

description:
List of up to 3 `Notify Parties`. The first item in the list is the **First Notify Party** (`N1`), the second item is the **Second Notify Party** (`N2`) and the last item is the **Other Notify Party** (`NI`).

**Condition:** If provided:
  - Mandatory for To Order BLs, `isToOrder=true`
  - The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
最多 3 個“通知方”的列表。列表中的第一項是**第一通知方**（`N1`），第二項是**第二通知方**（`N2`），最後一項是**其他通知方**（`NI`）。

**條件：** 如果提供：
  - 訂購 BL 的強制要求，`isToOrder=true`
  - 該數組中項目的順序**必須**由 API 提供者保留。

description: Name of the party.
description_ZH: 政黨名稱。

description:
Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS` (Not a legal person, but recognised under Union or National law as having the capacity to perform legal acts)
description_ZH:
根據聯盟海關法典，可以是以下值之一。 5（4）：
- `NATURAL_PERSON`（作為個體的活人的人）
- `LEGAL_PERSON`（可以執行法律行動的人（包括人類和公共或私人組織），例如擁有財產、起訴和被起訴）
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS`（不是法人，但根據聯邦或國家法律承認具有執行法律行為的能力）

description: The name of the street of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的街道名稱。

description: The number of the street of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的街道號碼。

description: The floor of the party’s street number.
description_ZH: 當事人所在街道的樓層。

description: The post code of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的郵政編碼。

description: A numbered box at a post office where a person or business can have mail or parcels delivered.
description_ZH: 郵局的編號信箱，個人或企業可以在其中投遞郵件或包裹。

description: The city name of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址的城市名稱。

description:
The UN Location code specifying where the carrier booking office is located. The pattern used must be
- 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
- 3 characters to code a location within that country. Letters A-Z and numbers from 2-9 can be used
More info can be found here: [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)
description_ZH:
指定承運人預訂辦公室所在位置的聯合國位置代碼。使用的模式必須是
- 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的 2 個字符表示國家/地區代碼
- 3 個字符來編碼該國家/地區內的位置。可以使用字母 A-Z 和數字 2-9
更多信息可以在這裡找到：[UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)

description: The state/region of the party’s address.
description_ZH: 當事人地址所在的州/地區。

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description:
The address of the party to be displayed on the `Transport Document`. The displayed address may be used to match the address provided in the `Letter of Credit`.

**Conditions:** If provided:
  - the displayed address must be included in the `Transport Document`.
  - for physical BL (`isElectronic=false`), it is only allowed to provide max 2 lines of 35 characters
  - for electronic BL (`isElectronic=true`), the limit is 6 lines of 35 characters
  - the order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
“運輸文件”上顯示的當事人地址。顯示的地址可用於匹配“信用證”中提供的地址。

**條件：** 如果提供：
  - 顯示的地址必須包含在“運輸文件”中。
  - 對於物理 BL (`isElectronic=false`)，僅允許提供最多 2 行 35 個字符
  - 對於電子 BL (`isElectronic=true`)，限制為 6 行，每行 35 個字符
  - 該數組中項目的順序**必須**由 API 提供者保留。

description:
Specifies the role of the party in a given context. Possible values are:

- `SCO` (Service Contract Owner)
- `DDR` (Consignor's freight forwarder)
- `DDS` (Consignee's freight forwarder)
- `COW` (Invoice payer on behalf of the consignor (shipper))
- `COX` (Invoice payer on behalf of the consignee)
- `CS` (Consolidator)
- `MF` (Manufacturer)
- `WH` (Warehouse Keeper)
description_ZH:
指定一方在給定上下文中的角色。可能的值為：

- `SCO`（服務合同所有者）
- `DDR`（發貨人的貨運代理）
- `DDS`（收貨人的貨運代理）
- `COW`（代表發貨人（托運人）的發票付款人）
- `COX`（代表收貨人的發票付款人）
- `CS`（合併者）
- `MF`（製造商）
- `WH`（倉庫管理員）

description: Indicates whether cargo is delivered to EU, Norway, Switzerland or Northern Ireland.
description_ZH: 指示貨物是否運送至歐盟、挪威、瑞士或北愛爾蘭。

description: A list of `ConsignmentItems`
description_ZH: `ConsignmentItems` 列表

description: The associated booking number provided by the carrier for this `Consignment Item`.
description_ZH: 承運人為此“寄售物品”提供的關聯預訂號。

description: A unique reference to the commodity object assigned by the carrier in the booking confirmation. The reference must be provided by the shipper as part of the `Shipping Instructions` for the carrier to link this consignment item to the commodity. A commodity reference is only unique in the context of a booking.
description_ZH: 對承運商在預訂確認中分配的商品對象的唯一引用。托運人必須提供該參考信息，作為“運輸說明”的一部分，以便承運人將此托運物品與商品聯繫起來。商品參考僅在預訂時才是唯一的。

description:
A plain language description that is precise enough for Customs services to be able to identify the goods. General terms (i.e. 'consolidated', 'general cargo' 'parts' or 'freight of all kinds') or not sufficiently precise description cannot be accepted.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
簡單明了的語言描述，足夠精確，以便海關部門能夠識別貨物。不能接受一般術語（即“拼裝”、“普通貨物”、“零件”或“各種貨物”）或不夠精確的描述。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description: A list of `HS Codes` that apply to this `consignmentItem`
description_ZH: 適用於此“寄售物品”的“HS 代碼”列表

description: A list of `National Commodity Codes` that apply to this `commodity`
description_ZH: 適用於該“商品”的“國家商品代碼”列表

description:
The national commodity classification code, which can be one of the following values defined by DCSA:
- `NCM` (Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul)
- `HTS` (Harmonized Tariff Schedule)
- `SCHEDULE_B` ( Schedule B)
- `TARIC` (Integrated Tariff of the European Communities)
- `CN` (Combined Nomenclature)
- `CUS` (Customs Union and Statistics)
description_ZH:
國家商品分類代碼，可以是DCSA定義的以下值之一：
- `NCM`（Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul）
- “HTS”（統一關稅表）
- `SCHEDULE_B`（時間表 B）
- `TARIC`（歐洲共同體綜合關稅）
- `CN`（組合命名法）
- “CUS”（關稅同盟和統計）

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description: A list of `national commodity codes` values.
description_ZH: “國家商品代碼”值列表。

description:
A list of the `ShippingMarks` applicable to this `consignmentItem`

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.
description_ZH:
適用於該“consignmentItem”的“ShippingMarks”列表

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

description: A list of all `cargoItems`
description_ZH: 所有“cargoItems”的列表

description:
The unique identifier for the equipment, which should follow the BIC ISO Container Identification Number where possible.
According to [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), a container identification code consists of a 4-letter prefix and a 7-digit number (composed of a 3-letter owner code, a category identifier, a serial number, and a check-digit).

If a container does not comply with [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), it is suggested to follow [Recommendation #2: Containers with non-ISO identification](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations) from SMDG.
description_ZH:
設備的唯一標識符，應盡可能遵循 BIC ISO 集裝箱標識號。
根據[ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，集裝箱識別碼由4個字母的前綴和7位數字組成（由3個字母的所有者代碼、類別標識符、序列號和校驗位組成）。

如果集裝箱不符合 [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，建議遵​​循 SMDG 的[建議 #2：具有非 ISO 標識的集裝箱](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations)。

description: The weight of the cargo item including packaging being carried in the container. Excludes the tare weight of the container. A maximum of 3 decimals should be provided.
description_ZH: 貨物的重量，包括集裝箱內運輸的包裝。不包括集裝箱的皮重。最多應提供 3 位小數。

description:
The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms:
- `KGM` (Kilograms)
- `LBR` (Pounds)
description_ZH:
可以用英製或公制術語表示的計量單位：
- `KGM`（公斤）
- “LBR”（磅）

description: Calculated by multiplying the width, height, and length of the packed cargo. A maximum of 4 decimals should be provided.
description_ZH: 通過將包裝貨物的寬度、高度和長度相乘來計算。最多應提供 4 位小數。

description:
The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms:
- `FTQ` (Cubic foot)
- `MTQ` (Cubic meter)
description_ZH:
可以用英製或公制術語表示的計量單位：
- `FTQ`（立方英尺）
- `MTQ`（立方米）

description: The weight of the cargo item excluding packaging being carried in the container. Excludes the tare weight of the container. A maximum of 3 decimals should be provided.
description_ZH: 集裝箱內貨物的重量，不包括包裝物。不包括集裝箱的皮重。最多應提供 3 位小數。

description:
The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms:
- `KGM` (Kilograms)
- `LBR` (Pounds)
description_ZH:
可以用英製或公制術語表示的計量單位：
- `KGM`（公斤）
- “LBR”（磅）

description: Calculated by multiplying the width, height, and length of the cargo, excluding packaging.
description_ZH: 計算方法是貨物的寬度、高度和長度相乘，不包括包裝。

description:
The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms:
- `FTQ` (Cubic foot)
- `MTQ` (Cubic meter)
description_ZH:
可以用英製或公制術語表示的計量單位：
- `FTQ`（立方英尺）
- `MTQ`（立方米）

description:
Information provided by the shipper to indicate whether an `Export License` or permit is required for this shipment/commodity/destination.
  
**Note:** If this property is omitted, it may be interpreted differently by different API providers and by the same API provider in different contexts.
description_ZH:
Information provided by the shipper to indicate whether an `Export License` or permit is required for this shipment/commodity/destination.
  
**注意：** 如果省略此屬性，則不同的 API 提供程序以及同一 API 提供程序在不同的上下文中可能會對其進行不同的解釋。

description: Reference number assigned to an `Export License` or permit, which authorizes a business or individual to export specific goods to specific countries under defined conditions. It is a permit that is required when shipping certain restricted or controlled goods, such as military equipment, high-tech items, chemicals, or items subject to international regulations. The `Export License` must be valid at time of departure.
description_ZH: 分配給“出口許可證”或許可證的參考號，授權企業或個人在規定條件下將特定貨物出口到特定國家。運輸某些限製或受控貨物（例如軍事設備、高科技物品、化學品或受國際法規約束的物品）時需要獲得許可證。 “出口許可證”在出發時必須有效。

description: Issue date of the `Export License`.
description_ZH: “出口許可證”的簽發日期。

description: Expiry date of the `Export License`.
description_ZH: “出口許可證”的到期日期。

description:
Information provided by the shipper to indicate whether an `Import License` or permit is required for this shipment/commodity/destination.
  
**Note:** If this property is omitted, it may be interpreted differently by different API providers and by the same API provider in different contexts.
description_ZH:
托運人提供的信息，表明該貨物/商品/目的地是否需要“進口許可證”或許可證。
  
**注意：** 如果省略此屬性，則不同的 API 提供程序以及同一 API 提供程序在不同的上下文中可能會對其進行不同的解釋。

description: Reference number assigned to an `Import License` or permit, issued by countries exercising import controls that authorizes the importation of the articles stated in the license. The `Import License` must be valid at time of arrival.
description_ZH: 分配給“進口許可證”或許可證的參考號，由實行進口管制的國家頒發，授權進口許可證中規定的物品。 “進口許可證”在抵達時必須有效。

description: Issue date of the `Import License`.
description_ZH: “進口許可證”的簽發日期。

description: Expiry date of the `Import License`.
description_ZH: “進口許可證”的到期日期。

description:
A code identifying the outer packaging/overpack. `PackageCode` must follow the codes specified in [Recommendation N°21](https://unece.org/trade/uncefact/cl-recommendations)

**Condition:** only applicable to dangerous goods if the `IMO packaging code` is not available.
description_ZH:
識別外包裝/合成包裝的代碼。 `PackageCode` 必須遵循[建議 N°21](https://unece.org/trade/uncefact/cl-recommendations) 中指定的代碼

**條件：**僅適用於沒有“IMO 包裝代碼”的危險貨物。

description: Specifies the number of outer packagings/overpacks associated with this `Cargo Item`.
description_ZH: 指定與此“貨物項目”關聯的外包裝/合成包裝的數量。

description: Description of the outer packaging/overpack.
description_ZH: 外包裝/外包裝的描述。

description:
Property to clearly indicate if the products, packaging and any other items are made of wood. Possible values include:
- `NOT_APPLICABLE` (if no wood or any other wood product such as packaging and supports are being shipped)
- `NOT_TREATED_AND_NOT_CERTIFIED` (if the wood or wooden materials have not been treated nor fumigated and do not include a certificate)
- `PROCESSED` (if the wood or wooden materials are entirely made of processed wood, such as plywood, particle board, sliver plates of wood and wood laminate sheets produced using glue, heat, pressure or a combination of these)
- `TREATED_AND_CERTIFIED` (if the wood or wooden materials have been treated and/or fumigated and include a certificate)
description_ZH:
清楚表明產品、包裝和任何其他物品是否由木材製成的屬性。可能的值包括：
-“不適用”（如果沒有運輸木材或任何其他木製品，例如包裝和支撐件）
- `NOT_TREATED_AND_NOT_CERTIFIED`（如果木材或木質材料未經處理或熏蒸且不包含證書）
-“加工過”（如果木材或木質材料完全由加工過的木材製成，例如膠合板、刨花板、木條板和使用膠水、熱、壓力或這些方法的組合生產的木質層壓板）
- `TREATED_AND_CERTIFIED`（如果木材或木質材料已經過處理和/或熏蒸並包含證書）

description: A list of `National Commodity Codes` that apply to this `cargoItem`
description_ZH: 適用於該“cargoItem”的“國家商品代碼”列表

description:
The national commodity classification code, which can be one of the following values defined by DCSA:
- `NCM` (Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul)
- `HTS` (Harmonized Tariff Schedule)
- `SCHEDULE_B` ( Schedule B)
- `TARIC` (Integrated Tariff of the European Communities)
- `CN` (Combined Nomenclature)
- `CUS` (Customs Union and Statistics)
description_ZH:
國家商品分類代碼，可以是DCSA定義的以下值之一：
- `NCM`（Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul）
- “HTS”（統一關稅表）
- `SCHEDULE_B`（時間表 B）
- `TARIC`（歐洲共同體綜合關稅）
- `CN`（組合命名法）
- “CUS”（關稅同盟和統計）

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

- `CAR` (Carrier)
- `SHI` (Shipper)
- `VET` (Veterinary)
- `CUS` (Customs)

**Condition:** Seal source may be required depending on the type of commodity being shipped.

- `CAR`（承運人）
- `SHI`（托運人）
-“VET”（獸醫）
- “CUS”（海關）

**條件：** 根據所運輸商品的類型，可能需要密封源。

description_ZH: 提供者定義的清單類型代碼。

description:
Indicates whether the shipper (`SELF`) will perform the advance manifest filing(s) for the House BL directly or if the carrier (`CARRIER`) should file them on their behalf. Allowed values are:

- `SELF` (filing done by the House filer)
- `CARRIER` (the carrier does the filing)

In case of self-filing (`SELF`), the shipper can provide their `selfFilerCode` for each manifest.

**Condition:** The `selfFilerCode` must be provided when `manifestTypeCode` is one of `ACE` (US) or `ACI` (CA) and the `advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy` is set to `SELF`.
description_ZH:
指示托運人 (`SELF`) 是否將直接為 House BL 進行預先艙單備案，或者承運人 (`CARRIER`) 是否應代表他們進行備案。允許的值為：

-“SELF”（眾議院歸檔人完成的歸檔）
- `承運人`（承運人進行備案）

如果是自助歸檔（“SELF”），托運人可以為每個清單提供“selfFilerCode”。

**條件：** 當“manifestTypeCode”為“ACE”（美國）或“ACI”（加拿大）之一且“advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy”設置為“SELF”時，必須提供“selfFilerCode”。

description:
Code identifying the party who will submit the advance manifest filing(s) for the House BL.

**Mandatory** if `manifestTypeCode` is one of `ACE` (US) or `ACI` (CA) and `advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy` is set to `SELF`.
description_ZH:
識別將為眾議院 BL 提交預先艙單備案的一方的代碼。

**強制** 如果“manifestTypeCode”是“ACE”（美國）或“ACI”（加拿大）之一，並且“advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy”設置為“SELF”。

description:
An identification number of the house filer responsible for submitting the `Advance Manifest Filing`.

**Condition:** Mandatory if `manifestTypeCode` is `ENS` and `advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy` is `SELF`.
description_ZH:
負責提交“預先艙單歸檔”的房屋歸檔人的識別號。

**條件：** 如果“manifestTypeCode”為“ENS”且“advanceManifestFilingsHouseBLPerformedBy”為“SELF”，則為強制。

description:
Indicates whether one or more `House Bill of Lading(s)` have been issued.

**Condition:** Mandatory if `manifestTypeCode` is `ENS`
description_ZH:
表明是否已簽發一份或多份“分期提單”。

**條件：** 如果 `manifestTypeCode` 為 `ENS` 則為強制

description: A list of `House Bill of Ladings` specified by the Shipper.
description_ZH: 托運人指定的“分期提單”清單。

description: A unique number allocated by the Ocean Transport Intermediary (OTI) to the `House Bill of Lading`.
description_ZH: 由海洋運輸中介機構 (OTI) 分配給“分提單”的唯一編號。

description: Indicates whether the `House Bill of Lading` (HBL) is issued `to order` or not. If `true`, `Notify party` at `HBL` level is mandatory
description_ZH: 指示“分提單”(HBL) 是否“按訂單”簽發。如果為“true”，則“HBL”級別的“通知方”為必填項

description:
The name of the location.

**Condition:** Mandatory to provide in case `UN Location Code` is not provided
description_ZH:
位置的名稱。

**條件：** 如果未提供“聯合國位置代碼”，則必須提供

description:
The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)

**Condition:** Mandatory to provide in case `UN Location Code` is not provided
description_ZH:
使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

**條件：** 如果未提供“聯合國位置代碼”，則必須提供

description:
The UN Location code specifying where the place is located. The pattern used must be

- 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
- 3 characters to code a location within that country. Letters A-Z and numbers from 2-9 can be used

More info can be found here: [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)
description_ZH:
指定地點所在位置的聯合國位置代碼。使用的模式必須是

- 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的 2 個字符表示國家/地區代碼
- 3 個字符來編碼該國家/地區內的位置。可以使用字母 A-Z 和數字 2-9

更多信息可以在這裡找到：[UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download)

description:

**Condition:** Mandatory to provide in case `UN Location Code` is not provided

description:
Method used for the payment of freight charges. It can be one of the following values: 
- `A` (Payment in cash)
- `B` (Payment by credit card)
- `C` (Payment by cheque)
- `D` (Other (e.g. direct debit to cash account))
- `H` (Electronic funds transfer)
- `Y` (Account holder with carrier)
- `Z` (Not pre-paid)
description_ZH:
用於支付運費的方法。它可以是以下值之一： 
- “A”（現金付款）
- “B”（信用卡付款）
- `C`（通過支票付款）
- `D`（其他（例如直接借記至現金賬戶））
- “H”（電子資金轉賬）
- “Y”（擁有運營商的賬戶持有人）
- “Z”（未預付費）

description: Name of the party.
description_ZH: 政黨名稱。

description:
Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS` (Not a legal person, but recognised under Union or National law as having the capacity to perform legal acts)
description_ZH:
根據聯盟海關法典，可以是以下值之一。 5（4）：
- `NATURAL_PERSON`（作為個體的活人的人）
- `LEGAL_PERSON`（可以執行法律行動的人（包括人類和公共或私人組織），例如擁有財產、起訴和被起訴）
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS`（不是法人，但根據聯邦或國家法律承認具有執行法律行為的能力）

description:
Can be one of the following values as per the Union Customs Code art. 5(4):
- `NATURAL_PERSON` (A person that is an individual living human being)
- `LEGAL_PERSON` (person (including a human being and public or private organizations) that can perform legal actions, such as own a property, sue and be sued)
- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS` (Not a legal person, but recognised under Union or National law as having the capacity to perform legal acts)

- `ASSOCIATION_OF_PERSONS`（不是法人，但根據聯邦或國家法律承認具有執行法律行為的能力）

description_ZH: 鏈接到“Party”的引用。

description:
Specifies the role of the party in a given context. Possible values are:

- `DDR` (Consignor's freight forwarder)
- `DDS` (Consignee's freight forwarder)
- `CS` (Consolidator)
- `MF` (Manufacturer)
- `WH` (Warehouse Keeper)
description_ZH:
指定一方在給定上下文中的角色。可能的值為：

- `DDR`（發貨人的貨運代理）
- `DDS`（收貨人的貨運代理）
- `CS`（合併者）
- `MF`（製造商）
- `WH`（倉庫管理員）

description: Indicates whether cargo is delivered to EU, Norway, Switzerland or Northern Ireland.
description_ZH: 指示貨物是否運送至歐盟、挪威、瑞士或北愛爾蘭。

description:
Identification in a chronological order of the countries through which the goods are routed between the country of original departure and final destination as stipulated in the lowest House Bill of Lading.

**Condition:** The order of the items in this array **MUST** be preserved as by the provider of the API.

**Condition:** If provided - the first country in the list must be the country of `Place of Acceptance`; the last country in the list must be the country of `Place of Final Delivery`.
description_ZH:
按照最低分提單規定，按時間順序識別貨物在起始出發國和最終目的地之間途經的國家/地區。

**條件：** 此數組中項目的順序 **必須** 由 API 提供者保留。

**條件：** 如果提供 - 列表中的第一個國家必須是“接受地點”的國家；列表中的最後一個國家/地區必須是“最終交貨地點”所在的國家/地區。

description: A list of `ConsignmentItems` for this `House Bill of Lading`
description_ZH: 此“分提單”的“寄售項目”列表

description: A plain language description that is precise enough for Customs services to be able to identify the goods. General terms (i.e. 'consolidated', 'general cargo' 'parts' or 'freight of all kinds') or not sufficiently precise description cannot be accepted. Where the declarant provides the CUS code for chemical substances and preparations, Member States may waive the requirement of providing a precise description of the goods.
description_ZH: 簡單明了的語言描述，足夠精確，以便海關部門能夠識別貨物。不能接受一般術語（即“拼裝”、“普通貨物”、“零件”或“各種貨物”）或不夠精確的描述。如果報關人提供化學物質和製劑的 CUS 代碼，成員國可以免除提供貨物準確描述的要求。

description:
The national commodity classification code, which can be one of the following values defined by DCSA:
- `NCM` (Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul)
- `HTS` (Harmonized Tariff Schedule)
- `SCHEDULE_B` ( Schedule B)
- `TARIC` (Integrated Tariff of the European Communities)
- `CN` (Combined Nomenclature)
- `CUS` (Customs Union and Statistics)
description_ZH:
國家商品分類代碼，可以是DCSA定義的以下值之一：
- `NCM`（Nomenclatura Comum do Mercosul）
- “HTS”（統一關稅表）
- `SCHEDULE_B`（時間表 B）
- `TARIC`（歐洲共同體綜合關稅）
- `CN`（組合命名法）
- “CUS”（關稅同盟和統計）

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description: A list of `national commodity codes` values.
description_ZH: “國家商品代碼”值列表。

description: A list of all `cargoItems`
description_ZH: 所有“cargoItems”的列表

description:
The unique identifier for the equipment, which should follow the BIC ISO Container Identification Number where possible.
According to [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), a container identification code consists of a 4-letter prefix and a 7-digit number (composed of a 3-letter owner code, a category identifier, a serial number, and a check-digit).

If a container does not comply with [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), it is suggested to follow [Recommendation #2: Containers with non-ISO identification](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations) from SMDG.
description_ZH:
設備的唯一標識符，應盡可能遵循 BIC ISO 集裝箱標識號。
根據[ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，集裝箱識別碼由4個字母的前綴和7位數字組成（由3個字母的所有者代碼、類別標識符、序列號和校驗位組成）。

如果集裝箱不符合 [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，建議遵​​循 SMDG 的[建議 #2：具有非 ISO 標識的集裝箱](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations)。

description: The weight of the cargo item including packaging being carried in the container. Excludes the tare weight of the container. A maximum of 3 decimals should be provided.
description_ZH: 貨物的重量，包括集裝箱內運輸的包裝。不包括集裝箱的皮重。最多應提供 3 位小數。

description:
The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms:
- `KGM` (Kilograms)
- `LBR` (Pounds)
description_ZH:
可以用英製或公制術語表示的計量單位：
- `KGM`（公斤）
- “LBR”（磅）

description: A code identifying the outer packaging/overpack. `PackageCode` must follow the codes specified in [Recommendation N°21](https://unece.org/trade/uncefact/cl-recommendations)
description_ZH: 識別外包裝/合成包裝的代碼。 `PackageCode` 必須遵循[建議 N°21](https://unece.org/trade/uncefact/cl-recommendations) 中指定的代碼

description:
Specifies the number of outer packagings/overpacks associated with this `Cargo Item`.

**Condition:** Mandatory if `packageCode` is **NOT** one of the following values:

- `VY` (Bulk, solid, fine particles ("powders"))
- `VS` (Bulk, scrap metal)
- `VR` (Bulk, solid, granular particles ("grains"))
- `VQ` (Bulk, liquefied gas (at abnormal temperature/pressure))
- `VO` (Bulk, solid, large particles ("nodules"))
- `VL` (Bulk, liquid)
- `NG` (Unpacked or unpackaged, multiple units)
- `NF` (Unpacked or unpackaged, single unit)
- `NE` (Unpacked or unpackaged)
- `VG` (Bulk, gas (at 1031 mbar and 15°C))
description_ZH:
指定與此“貨物項目”關聯的外包裝/合成包裝的數量。

**條件：** 如果 `packageCode` 不為下列值之一，則為強制：

- `VY`（散裝、固體、細顆粒（“粉末”））
- `VS`（散裝、廢金屬）
- `VR`（散裝、固體、粒狀顆粒（“顆粒”））
- `VQ`（散裝液化氣體（在異常溫度/壓力下））
- `VO`（散裝、固體、大顆粒（“結節”））
- `VL`（散裝、液體）
- `NG`（未包裝或未包裝，多件）
- `NF`（未包裝或未包裝，單個單元）
- `NE`（未包裝或未包裝）
- `VG`（散裝，氣體（在 1031 mbar 和 15°C 下））

description: The identifying details of a package or the actual markings that appear on the package(s). This information is provided by the customer.
description_ZH: 包裝的識別細節或包裝上出現的實際標記。該信息由客戶提供。

description: United Nations Dangerous Goods Identifier (UNDG) assigned by the UN Sub-Committee of Experts on the Transport of Dangerous Goods and shown in the IMO IMDG.
description_ZH: 聯合國危險貨物標識符 (UNDG) 由聯合國危險貨物運輸專家小組委員會指定，並顯示在 IMO IMDG 中。

description: A list of `Customs references`
description_ZH: “海關參考”列表

description: The reference type code as defined in the relevant customs jurisdiction.
description_ZH: 相關海關管轄區定義的參考類型代碼。

description: The 2 characters for the country code using [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en)
description_ZH: 使用 [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:pub:PUB500001:en) 的國家/地區代碼的 2 個字符

description: A list of `Utilized Transport Equipment` for this `House Bill of Lading`
description_ZH: 該“分提單”的“已使用運輸設備”清單

description: A list of `Seals`
description_ZH: “密封件”列表

description: Identifies a seal affixed to the container.
description_ZH: 識別貼在容器上的密封件。

description:
The source of the seal, namely who has affixed the seal.
- `CAR` (Carrier)
- `SHI` (Shipper)
- `VET` (Veterinary)
- `CUS` (Customs)

**Condition:** Seal source may be required depending on the type of commodity being shipped.
description_ZH:
印章的來源，即蓋印者。
- `CAR`（承運人）
- `SHI`（托運人）
-“VET”（獸醫）
- “CUS”（海關）

**條件：** 根據所運輸商品的類型，可能需要密封源。

description:
Indication if the container is `EMPTY` or `LADEN`.

- `EMPTY` (Empty)
- `LADEN` (Laden)
description_ZH:
指示容器是“EMPTY”還是“LADEN”。

- `空`（空）
-“拉登”（拉登）

description: Indicates whether the container is shipper owned (SOC).
description_ZH: 指示集裝箱是否為托運人所有 (SOC)。

description:
The unique identifier for the equipment, which should follow the BIC ISO Container Identification Number where possible.
According to [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), a container identification code consists of a 4-letter prefix and a 7-digit number (composed of a 3-letter owner code, a category identifier, a serial number, and a check-digit).

If a container does not comply with [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html), it is suggested to follow [Recommendation #2: Containers with non-ISO identification](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations) from SMDG.
description_ZH:
設備的唯一標識符，應盡可能遵循 BIC ISO 集裝箱標識號。
根據[ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，集裝箱識別碼由4個字母的前綴和7位數字組成（由3個字母的所有者代碼、類別標識符、序列號和校驗位組成）。

如果集裝箱不符合 [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html)，建議遵​​循 SMDG 的[建議 #2：具有非 ISO 標識的集裝箱](https://smdg.org/documents/smdg-recommendations)。

description: Unique code for the different equipment size and type used to transport commodities. The code can refer to one of ISO size type (e.g. 22G1) or ISO type group (e.g. 22GP) following the [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html) standard.
description_ZH: 用於運輸商品的不同設備尺寸和類型的唯一代碼。該代碼可以引用遵循 [ISO 6346](https://www.iso.org/standard/83558.html) 標準的 ISO 尺寸類型（例如 22G1）或 ISO 類型組（例如 22GP）之一。
